General.Name: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of precision mechanical modules primarily in China. The company's products are used in TV stands, TV front bezels and back covers, and notebooks. It serves a range of TV brands and manufacturers. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Ye  Cheng
4.Title: Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
